## JsPlumbInstance.manageAll() method

Manage a group of elements.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
manageAll(elements: ArrayLike<T["E"]> | string, recalc?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  elements | ArrayLike&lt;T\["E"\]&gt; \| string | Array-like object of strings or elements (can be an Array or a NodeList), or a CSS selector (which is applied with the instance's container element as its context) |
|  recalc | boolean | Maybe recalculate offsets for the element also. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
